name: META (digaly)
description:
Dodge the obstacles for as long as you can.

Thanks to Jerkakame for testing and providing suggestions!

Controls:

Ship movement: WASD/Arrow keys
Ship turning (for in bends): Hold space + A or D/Left or right arrow
Turn vertical (for vertical splits): X/Left control
Use slowmotion: C/Left shift

WASD/Arrows keys act much like strafing (moving up/down, left/right), however when you hold spacebar, A/D or Left/Right will turn the ship rather than strafe. You need this when you reach a bend or a splitting path.

When you release space again, the ship will snap to the new angle.

You can only have one  slowmotion power up at any time and you can trigger it when you feel like you need it.
